content: the soft color transitions and delicate stitches will never reveal how speedy this scarf is to crochet worked in a simple filet pattern this triangle scarf is light enough to wear almost year round and makes an elegant one-skein gift for mother s day birthdays christmas and just because gifts this is a perfect project for confident beginners who have a skein of lion brand mandala yarn burning a hole in their pocket video tutorial available 3 24 2108 check out all my free modern crochet patterns here 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/category/knitting-and-crocheting/
